pkgmetadata.longdescription: CEU Mass Mediator RESTful API // CEU (CEU San Pablo University) Mass Mediator is an on-line tool for aiding researchers in performing metabolite annotation. 'cmmr' (CEU Mass Mediator RESTful API) allows for programmatic access in R: batch search, batch advanced search, MS/MS (tandem mass spectrometry) search, etc. For more information about the API Endpoint please go to https://github.com/YaoxiangLi/cmmr.
